bibl.title: Condition(al)s of Repayment: P. CLT 10 Reconsidered.
bibl.note: Reedition of P. CLT 10 with a linguistic analysis, which highlights a number of grammatical features characteristic of Theban legal documents such as the performative ⲉⲓⲥⲱⲧⲙ and the negative protatic ⲉϥⲧⲙⲥⲱⲧⲙ. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Jennifer Cromwell & Eitan Grossman, Condition(al)s of Repayment: P. CLT 10 Reconsidered.
JEA 96 (2010) pp. 149-160, 1 tabl. et pl. coul. III.

Reedition of P. CLT 10 with a linguistic analysis, which highlights a number of grammatical features characteristic of Theban legal documents such as the performative ⲉⲓⲥⲱⲧⲙ and the negative protatic ⲉϥⲧⲙⲥⲱⲧⲙ. - Avec résumé en anglais.
